MsgConnectionOpenInit.title: Msg Connection Open Init
MsgConnectionOpenInit.description: MsgConnectionOpenInit defines the msg sent by an account on Chain A to initialize a connection with Chain B.

ibc.core.commitment.v1.MerklePrefix.title: Merkle Prefix
ibc.core.commitment.v1.MerklePrefix.description: MerklePrefix is merkle path prefixed to the key. The constructed key from the Path and the key will be append(Path.KeyPath, append(Path.KeyPrefix, key...))

client_id.description: identifies the client on the counterparty chain associated with a given connection.

connection_id.description: identifies the connection end on the counterparty chain associated with a given connection.

prefix.description: commitment merkle prefix of the counterparty chain.

ibc.core.connection.v1.Counterparty.title: Counterparty
ibc.core.connection.v1.Counterparty.description: Counterparty defines the counterparty chain associated with a connection end.

features.description: list of features compatible with the specified identifier

ibc.core.connection.v1.Version.title: Version
ibc.core.connection.v1.Version.description: Version defines the versioning scheme used to negotiate the IBC version in the connection handshake.
